column5: Well we spent a few days up at the cottage, had a blast fishing with the kids, smallmouth and rainbow trout, here are a few pic's of my nephew the only one that would hold the fish, all fish in the pic's caught by the kids, I never had a chance to fish,lol
Great stuff, love seeing the kids fishing.  Some really nice smallies with a beauty bow thrown in.
Nice fish'n! What reel is he using, it looks just like mine!
Nice smallies!  Bonus rainbow is a nice and well.
Ha, those are awesome pics. That kid looks like a natural
Some nice bass there, great report
I really like the shot of the two of them, "fish on" in the foreground, all business in the background.
Cause he knows that there is always another one following the one that is hooked!!  Great report
Sweet sweet delicious bass!!  Cheers HD
